name: Snake Desert Survival
description:
A game that was supposed to be released for the MiniJam, but I never quite finished in time. Still uploading to at least share it.

An Arcade style game, where a snake in a desert tries to survive and rank the highest score possible! Eat mice to refill your hunger, collect trophies, and dodge scorpions and eagles as long as possible.

Programmed in Unity and Art made in GIMP - I'm just really loving these limited palettes lately, I might stick to those for a bit longer!

I greatly enjoyed the process of making this game. I wanted to make a snake-related game in a long while, and the inspiration for this provided me the chance to.

Thanks for playing!

--- Credits

Art and Coding done by KaaSnake

Color Palette - Ice Cream GB Palette by Kerrie Lake

Music - sid c64 chip game music by Juhaux Games

Sound Effects - GAMEBOY SFX PACK #1 by OmegaPixelArt
